arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لِيْ فِيْهِ نَصِيْبًا مِنْ رَحْمَتِكَ الوَاسِعَةِ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah: on this day, (please] decide for me a share from Your expansive mercy,
And guide me on this day to Your luminous proofs,
And take me from the forelock to Your all-inclusive satisfaction;
Out of Your lovingness; O the hope of the eager ones.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
allāhummaj`al lī fīhi naṣīban min raḥmatikal wāsi`ah
